site.title: Soda Maricela - Authentic Local Food in Manuel Antonio
site.description: Experience real Costa Rican food at Soda Maricela. Best Casado & Gallo Pinto in Manuel Antonio. Located 20m from the bus station, look for the Sloth Mural!

hero.subtitle: Authentic Costa Rican flavor. The hidden gem locals love, just steps from the bus.
hero.location: 20m from Manuel Antonio Bus Station, Quepos

location.title: Look for the Sloth
location.body: We are the small restaurant with the sloth painted on the wall. Just 20 meters from the bus station. Real food, local prices.

founder.title: Meet Doña Maricela
founder.body: For decades, Doña Maricela has been cooking with love for locals and travelers alike. Here, you aren't just a tourist; you're family. Taste the tradition that powers Manuel Antonio.

food_casado.title: The Famous Casado
food_casado.body: Rice, beans, sweet plantains, fresh salad, and your choice of meat. The ultimate fuel for your hike in the National Park.

food_pinto.title: Gallo Pinto Power
food_pinto.body: The quintessential Costa Rican breakfast. Spotted rooster rice & beans. Perfect before hitting the beach.

reviews.title: Travelers Love Us
reviews.quote: The best authentic meal I had in Costa Rica! Cheap and delicious.
